@Module.Name: Select
@Module.Description: This module is a selection model, selecting the 5 possible component without relativity ranking to be acted on catering to user's intent
@Module.Note: This individual module only select 5 highly related components,without ranking them,and without analyzing the correctness of the components aligning with user's content

Output.<div id=2 class='com.google.android.gm:i: The 'Compose' button would be the first step to sending an email, user can directly compose a new email by clicking on this button.
Output.<div id=3 class='com.google.android.gm:i: This is a button to open the navigation drawer, which might have options to attach files or a Google Drive attachment.
Output.<button id=4 class='com.google.android.g: This component leads to an account detail and settings page. There might be options here to add attachments in Gmail.
Output.<div id=5 class='' description='Open nav: This 'Open navigation drawer' widget may also contain options to add attachments.
Output.<button id=1 class='' description='Meet': While the 'Meet' button does not directly relate to sending an email, it might contain related Google Drive options for adding attachments.

@Module.Name: Plan
@Module.Description: This module is a plan module, planning the next action based on the selected components, whether click or edit

candidate1.reason: To compose a new email and attach a Google Drive file.

candidate2.reason: To open the search functionality, not relevant to attaching a Google Drive file.

candidate3.reason: To access the account and settings, not relevant to attaching a Google Drive file.

candidate4.reason: To open the navigation drawer, not relevant to attaching a Google Drive file.

candidate5.reason: To access the 'Meet' feature, not relevant to attaching a Google Drive file.

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@Module.Name: Decide
@Module.Description: This module is a decision module, deciding the final action based on the evaluation result, whether complete or wrong or go on

Output.reason: The user has started composing a new email, which is necessary in order to send a Google Drive attachment. However, the user has not yet attached a file from Google Drive. Further actions are needed to complete this task.
